com.sencha.gxt.core.client.resources
Class StyleInjectorHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.sencha.gxt.core.client.resources.StyleInjectorHelper

public class StyleInjectorHelper
extends Object

Utility methods for injecting styles. These methods, like those in StyleInjector, bypass the use of CssResource.ensureInjected() to allow for immediate injection. These methods will inject CssResources only once as long as all injections are performed using this helper class.

Constructor Summary

          Ensures that the given CssResource is injected into the document.

Constructor Detail

StyleInjectorHelper

public StyleInjectorHelper()
Method Detail

ensureInjected

public static boolean ensureInjected(CssResource style,
                                     boolean immediately)
Ensures that the given CssResource is injected into the document. If the given CssResource has already been injected into the document, this method does nothing.

Parameters:
style - The CssResource to be injected
immediately - Whether to inject the the CssResource immediately. See StyleInjector.inject(boolean).
Returns:
true if the CssResource has been injected successfully, false otherwise. If the style resource has already been injected, this method returns false.

isInjected

public static boolean isInjected(CssResource style)
Determines whether the current CssResource has already been injected by this StyleInjectorHelper.

Parameters:
style - The CssResource for which to determine whether injection has occurred
Returns:
true if the CssResource has been injected, false otherwise.
